title: How to download free copyrighted background music? If it is possible, what are some sites name or URL also - Quora

response.answer_text: There are many “Royalty Free Music” sites are available. With this music also there will be with some conditions and without conditions. You should read what they want like credits etc. These are few sites which i can suggest. Bensound - click to get redirected to the site. Free Music Archive - click to get redirected to the site. Free stock music - click to get redirected to the site. Hooksounds - click to get redirected to the site.
